ygData.subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] i want some e mails
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, time for the list moderator to delete this guy. Several FCC and egroups rules are broken with this last message and I am sure everyone on the list would
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, time for the list moderator to delete this guy. Several FCC and egroups
rules are broken with this last message and I am sure everyone on the list
would appreciate having him removed.

Mike

P.S. "William Stevens" you may be 15, but your language and grammar appear
more in line with 9 or 10 year olds.

----- Original Message -----
From: "william stevens" <willwasere@...>
To: <_EQ_Magic@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 23, 2000 3:57 AM
Subject: RE: [_EQ_Magic] i want some e mails


> hello im the little kid you sent a e mail to and i am not a 9 or ten year
> old i am a 15 year old in a rush to write some e mails so you big twat why
> dont you fuckin say train you gimp ive seen funnyer lumps of shit than you
> so next time you send me a e mail like that im going to kill you you
biggit
> in the name of the lord oh yeah can you say Venice M. Fairbanks is a total
> puff reatarded goose and should be put in a chamber of death and be stabed
> for ever with a cocktail stick ha thought you couldnt do you no what dna
> stands for no well its national dislecic assosiation do you get it yes
good
> for you nob from your best friend satan
